privateKey.desc: The private key for used by the crypto module to create signed tokens or encrypt data.

queues.copilot.desc: The config for copilot job queue

queues.doc.desc: The config for doc job queue

queues.notification.desc: The config for notification job queue

queues.nightly.desc: The config for nightly job queue

throttlers.default.desc: The config for the default throttler.

throttlers.strict.desc: The config for the strict throttler.

transports.desc: The enabled transports for accepting websocket traffics.

maxHttpBufferSize.desc: How many bytes or characters a message can be, before closing the session (to avoid DoS).

requireEmailDomainVerification.desc: Whether require email domain record verification before accessing restricted resources.

requireEmailVerification.desc: Whether require email verification before accessing restricted resources(not implemented).

passwordRequirements.desc: The password strength requirements when set new password.

session.ttl.desc: Application auth expiration time in seconds.

session.ttr.desc: Application auth time to refresh in seconds.

SMTP.host.desc: Host of the email server (e.g. smtp.gmail.com)

SMTP.port.desc: Port of the email server (they commonly are 25, 465 or 587)

SMTP.username.desc: Username used to authenticate the email server

SMTP.password.desc: Password used to authenticate the email server

SMTP.sender.desc: Sender of all the emails (e.g. "AFFiNE Team <noreply@affine.pro>")

SMTP.ignoreTLS.desc: Whether ignore email server's TSL certification verification. Enable it for self-signed certificates.

experimental.yocto.desc: Use `y-octo` to merge updates at the same time when merging using Yjs.

history.interval.desc: The minimum time interval in milliseconds of creating a new history snapshot when doc get updated.

avatar.publicPath.desc: The public accessible path prefix for user avatars.

avatar.storage.desc: The config of storage for user avatars.

blob.storage.desc: The config of storage for all uploaded blobs(images, videos, etc.).

name.desc: A recognizable name for the server. Will be shown when connected with AFFiNE Desktop.

externalUrl.desc:
Base url of AFFiNE server, used for generating external urls.
Default to be `[server.protocol]://[server.host][:server.port]` if not specified.

https.desc: Whether the server is hosted on a ssl enabled domain (https://).

port.desc: Which port the server will listen on.

path.desc: Subpath where the server get deployed if there is.

earlyAccessControl.desc: Only allow users with early access features to access the app

endpoint.desc: The endpoint of the doc service.

versionControl.enabled.desc: Whether check version of client before accessing the server.

versionControl.requiredVersion.desc: Allowed version range of the app that allowed to access the server. Requires 'client/versionControl.enabled' to be true to take effect.

enabled.desc: Check captcha challenge when user authenticating the app.

config.desc: The config for the captcha plugin.

enabled.desc: Whether to enable the copilot plugin.

providers.openai.desc: The config for the openai provider.

providers.fal.desc: The config for the fal provider.

providers.gemini.desc: The config for the gemini provider.

providers.perplexity.desc: The config for the perplexity provider.

unsplash.desc: The config for the unsplash key.

storage.desc: The config for the storage provider.

showLifetimePrice.desc: Whether enable lifetime price and allow user to pay for it.

apiKey.desc: Stripe API key to enable payment service.

webhookKey.desc: Stripe webhook key to enable payment service.
